Product_Title: Gildan Unisex-Adult Dryblend T-Shirt, Style G8000, Multipack
Product_Detail:
Classic fit for loose comfort
Cotton-soft moisture wicking fabric for active lifestyles
Stay-dry comfort and coolness
Taped neck and shoulders for comfort and durability
Tear away label for customizable comfort
Screen printing, embroidery, iron-on transfers, discharge and DTG

Reviews.content: I used one of these for sublimation and it turned out great! I love gildan shirts, they are soft and generally pretty affordable! They are so soft and fit true to size!
Great price, good quality, great color
Love the bright green color, nice and roomy, washes well - all pros, no cons I can see. I'll be back for some other colors.
Pretty basic t-shirts for a good price and they seem fine, sturdy and sized properly.
These are my go to work tshirts. True to size and hold up pretty well for a work shirt.
Thick material. Great color. Good value.

I bought two large gray. I based my research and purchase on the Gildan brand sweatshirts which I think are decent quality.
These t-shirts are very thin, sleeves are a couple of inches too short and, the tail is easily 5 inches too long.
I guess I should have expected this considering the cost.
Guess I won't be buying Gildan t-shirts anymore.
Just wondering-why is it that no manufacturer seems to be able to produce any thing more than a mediocre product anymore??
Solution could be-raise your price slightly and actually use the extra revenue to make a decent product!!!

I have never written a review for any article of clothing. These shirts deserve one. I am 6'1, 175lbs and the Large fit me perfectly. Soft as hell, neck hasnt stretched, and its over all a damn good shirt.
I need the shirts for work. The color is exactly right however the size I ordered was wrong. To exchange them I would need a 1x
Amazing price, colors don't fade, true to size and they wash beautifully. I've ordered 12 shirts.
